description: A Flutter application's main file defining the root widget and home page, initializing the app with a basic scaffold and UI elements.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI for MyHomePage, building the scaffold and layout.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the widget, returning the application's main layout.
